title: I've gone 5 and 22 in my last 27 URF games
body: So I was at 116-100 and matchmaking seemed pretty normal/random but now I can't get more than 1 win without losing an insane amount of games. Should I go for the lottery with how crazy this has been? I don't do bad in most of them and yeah it's URF but it seems like Riot really wants me to gravitate me to the holy .500 by overloading me with 1 sided stomps where we can't even enjoy urf. Had a mumu who was 0-14 8 minutes in and I'm guessing he was the one saying no to our ff vote. Never seen a losing streak as bad as this one since I started URF, it happens in ARAM and Norms Draft as well but I thought this was a "truly random" mode

replies.body: Why are you reposting this from yesterday?

Wasn't even on here yesterday? I also made a different post that got deleted and this one is updated. Why are the boards more toxic than the actual game? People like you make these boards so hard to stay on

LOL you deleted it after I said that hahahaha. still a repost because you've done this 3 days in a row now. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/spgB3J8E-why-does-every-game-mode-do-this
I think you're on here too much bud, maybe get outside or something. Kinda weird how addicted to being toxic on the boards you are
So you're denying posting the same post 3 times in a row? lmao
Your profile shows that this is a re-post and it also shows that you WERE on yesterday. Don't lie.
I also see that this is level 20, did someone get banned recently?
It's called a smurf account. Ever heard of it before?

Yikessss based on YOUR board history you NEVER say anything constructive or positive, you're always demeaning people on here. What's up with that man? You really got nothing better to do than troll League boards?

Didn't realize I was on yesterday bud honest mistake

you're just bad I've seen your match history you never do well I'm actually getting unlucky where I get As and Ss
